sys_remote_update_set.description:
This is for Keith Johnson. Currently there is a manual process where Keith is sent an email that he must approve via email.
We need to create a catalog item that is created when an email is mailed in with the subject 'Splunk Report: WDC Privileged Account Weekly Audit' The process for this request item will be an approval sent to 'VA - IT Service Delivery' with the attachment from the email. If approved, the request is complete. If rejected, open a task to the same group to investigate. After that task is closed, send the approval again, following the same process until it is approved.
sys_remote_update_set.name: GP - STRY0012914 - Approval process for WDC Privileged ACC
